title: Day at the Show
creator_credit: State Film Centre of Victoria and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: A visit to Melbourne’s Royal Show. Commentary designed for children showing the animals, pavilions, motor displays, show bags, fun fair and the grand parade ending with a fireworks display.
creator_credit_for_label: State Film Centre of Victoria and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
